https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xBNawOjn4p3grjviHC6WFJDbtC3.jpg When the bored out philosopher Maarten Moreau gets caught up in a robbery, he accidentally gets hold of the weapon. Seized by a renewed appetite for life, Maarten decides to keep the gun. A true romance blossoms between the boy and the gun, not without consequences. Boy Meets Gun
